law.text:
As used in KRS 217.907 to 217.917:
"Legend drug" means any drug defined by the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act, as amended, and under which definition its label is required to bear the statement "Caution: Federal law prohibits dispensing without prescription."
"Distributor" means any person, corporation, or other entity which distributes for resale a legend drug under its own label even though it is not the actual manufacturer of the legend drug.
"Solid dosage form" means capsules, tablets, or similar legend drug products intended for oral administration.
"Board" means the Kentucky Board of Pharmacy.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982.
